forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 7C. SW winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low around 45F. SW winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
